fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Convert another player to this role. No cooldown and all Partisan Locusts can use this on the same night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the beginning of Day 1, or immediately if this spawns late (only if there were previously none), the Town will be notified that the glorious sun shines through hypocrisy. For the rest of the game, players can’t whisper, modkill themselves, or resign.
- If the Locusts win, each living Partisan Locusts must resurrect one dead non-Locust who hasn’t won. That player wins with the Locusts.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Convert the Town under the sun.
